title: Evergreen Tailored Blazer
description: Crafted from regenerative wool woven in small Italian mills. Naturally dyed using plant-based pigments for a refined matte finish. Designed for longevity with reinforced seams and timeless tailoring.

title: Tideweave Linen Shirt
description: Lightweight, breathable linen sourced from water-efficient farms. Soft-washed for comfort without chemical softeners. Ideal for both smart-casual and warm-weather formal wear.

title: Solstice Organic Cotton Tee
description: Made from 100% GOTS-certified organic cotton. Naturally dyed in small batches to minimize waste. Relaxed fit with structured shoulders for a modern silhouette.

title: Atlas Recycled Wool Trousers
description: Blended from post-consumer recycled wool fibers. Tailored with a clean, straight-leg profile. Breathable, durable, and wrinkle-resistant for all-day wear.

title: Horizon Hemp Overshirt
description: Built from durable, naturally antimicrobial hemp fabric. Washed with eco-friendly enzymes for softness. Perfect as a layering piece across seasons.

title: Nordic Merino Knit
description: Fine-gauge sweater made from ethically sourced merino wool. Temperature-regulating and breathable for year-round comfort. Minimalist ribbed detailing at cuffs and hem.

title: Pebblewash Denim Jacket
description: Made from low-impact, water-reduced denim. Dyed using indigo-free technology to reduce chemical runoff. Classic trucker fit with sustainable metal buttons.

title: Nimbus Recycled Puffer Vest
description: Filled with recycled ocean plastic insulation. Lightweight yet exceptionally warm. Finished with a PFC-free water-repellent coating.

title: Cedar Vegan Leather Loafers
description: Made from plant-based leather alternatives. Breathable lining crafted from recycled fibers. Designed for comfort without sacrificing formal elegance.

title: Verdant Bamboo Chinos
description: Soft, breathable bamboo-blend fabric with natural stretch. Dyed using low-impact methods to conserve water. Clean, tailored fit suitable for office or weekend wear.

title: Cascade Alpaca Coat
description: Handwoven alpaca wool sourced from ethical cooperatives. Naturally insulating while remaining lightweight. Minimalist design with hidden corozo buttons.

title: Urban Recycled Knit Hoodie
description: Spun from recycled polyester and organic cotton. Soft brushed interior for comfort. Reinforced stitching for durability in everyday wear.

title: Marina Tencel Polo
description: Made from sustainably harvested eucalyptus fibers. Naturally moisture-wicking and smooth to the touch. Smart-casual silhouette with a refined collar.

title: Boreal Tailored Overcoat
description: Constructed from recycled wool blends. Wind-resistant lining made from recycled nylon. Structured shoulders with a modern, streamlined cut.

title: Sandrift Organic Sweatpants
description: Premium loopback fabric made from organic cotton. Naturally dyed with minimal water usage. Relaxed fit with an elastic waistband and drawcord.

title: Canopy Hemp Blazer
description: Lightweight blazer woven from hemp and organic cotton. Breathable and naturally wrinkle-resistant. Soft-shoulder construction for a contemporary look.

title: Forge Reclaimed Denim Jeans
description: Made from reclaimed denim scraps re-spun into new yarn. Low-water finishing process reduces environmental impact. Slim-straight fit with classic five-pocket styling.

title: Seren Merino Scarf
description: Ultra-soft merino sourced from cruelty-free farms. Naturally dyed in earthy tones. Lightweight yet warm for versatile layering.

title: Atlas Cork Belt
description: Made from sustainably harvested cork. Naturally flexible, durable, and water-resistant. Polished stainless buckle with a minimalist design.

title: Riverstone Linen Suit
description: Breathable linen suit woven in small artisanal mills. Naturally dyed using plant-based pigments. Relaxed tailoring perfect for summer formal occasions.

title: Summit Recycled Parka
description: Shell made from recycled polyester bottles. Insulated with responsibly sourced down alternatives. Finished with a PFC-free water-resistant treatment.

title: Harbor Organic Oxford Shirt
description: Classic button-down made from organic cotton oxford. Low-impact dyeing minimizes environmental footprint. Structured collar with mother-of-pearl buttons.

title: Sable Tencel Trench
description: Smooth, drapey fabric derived from sustainably managed forests. Naturally breathable with a subtle sheen. Double-breasted silhouette with recycled hardware.

title: Prairie Wool Flannel Shirt
description: Soft brushed flannel made from recycled wool fibers. Naturally warm and breathable. Versatile layer that works dressed up or down.

title: Nimbus Lightweight Down Jacket
description: Filled with traceable, ethically sourced down. Shell made from recycled nylon. Packs easily for travel without bulk.

title: Mesa Organic Cotton Chore Jacket
description: Durable canvas woven from organic fibers. Naturally dyed to reduce chemical waste. Multiple utility pockets with a minimalist aesthetic.

title: Delta Bamboo Socks Set
description: Made from breathable bamboo fibers with natural antibacterial properties. Reinforced heel and toe for longevity. Comes in a neutral three-pack.

title: Slate Recycled Nylon Bomber
description: Outer fabric made from regenerated fishing nets. Lightweight insulation for transitional weather. Ribbed collar, cuffs, and hem for a clean finish.

description: Tailored from breathable European linen. Naturally dyed with low water consumption. Crisp pleats and a clean tapered leg.
